stimulusHtml: Which best describes the seeds used in Ai Weiwei’s installation Kui Hua Zi (Sunflower Seeds)?

features.html:
The question refers to the image shown of Ai Weiwei’s Kui Hua Zi (Sunflower Seeds).

© Oliver Strewe/Getty Images

choicesHtml: Recycled plastic was molded and painted to make each seed identical.
Growers collected millions of sunflower seeds, which were donated for the installation.
Industrial processes were used to mass produce millions of small individual seeds.
Individuals created each seed by hand, resulting in millions of unique works of art.
